overview: Who will survive the anal showdown? Seven Vivid superstars vie for a major role in a new international cable TV series, each showcasing their particular erotic skills. It's star against star in a catfight cattle call that culminates in a grudge orgy beyond your wildest dreams. Seven Vivid superstars ... out to prove their sex!
tagline: Who Will Survive the Final Showdown?
title: Last Girl Standing
